title: 297 Dan Harris on the Power of Meditating Even If You're A Skeptic
description:
"I don't think we should put upon ourselves expectations of perfection that are not attainable." - Dan Harris
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, video, and more at http://lewishowes.com/297
